name: Slime Scenario
description:
⚠️ WARNING: By viewing this page you acknowledge that you are voluntarily entering a slime scenario ⚠️

Survive as many waves as you can! Face off against a surprisingly variety of enemies given the time frame. Defend yourself using only your sticky slime and also the gun that every slug owns and carries.

Controls:

- WASD to move

- Arrow keys to shoot in 8 directions

Created by Matt Daly and Ethan Shahan for Roc Game Jam 2023
